General.Name: Hefei Gocom Information Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Hefei Gocom Information Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of industrial railway signal control and intelligent dispatching products in China. The company also offers narrow gauge signal control and intelligent dispatching products in underground mines, and information system integration and technical services. Its products are used in metallurgy, mining, petrochemicals, ports, power, railways, and other sectors. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Hefei, China.
